commit 591a8f9f0f3a9b58e199fc5cc669ab01afe7ffd2
Author: Alexander Alten-Lorenz <alexander@cloudera.com>
Date:   Tue Jan 15 11:44:47 2013 +0100

    HBASE-6372 Add scanner batching to Export job
    
    Description: When a single row is too large for the RS heap then an OOME can take out the entire RS. Setting scanner batching in custom scans helps avoiding this scenario, but for the supplied Export job this is not set.
    Reason: Customer request
    Author: Alexander Alten-Lorenz
    Ref: CDH-7016

commit fd99bd85f5820cb6ef962e028684c3ffdcb46d16
Author: Himanshu <himanshu@cloudera.com>
Date:   Sun Oct 14 17:44:51 2012 -0600

    CLOUDERA-BUILD. Upgrade Jetty to 6.1.26.cloudera.2.
    
    This version of Jetty has been found to be much more
    reliable in the context of MapReduce, so should be used
    in HBase as well.
    
    The source for this Jetty release can be found at
    https://github.com/cloudera/jetty-hadoop-fix and corresponds to
    commit 51042f4 in that repository.
    
    Author: Todd Lipcon
    Ref: CDH-7767
